attributes.action: announce a Day of National Celebration and Thanksgiving unto Almighty God for His Overwhelming Kindness to the Peoples of this United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland for His Great Deliverance of this United Kingdom from the Papist-Planned Installation of  Anthony Lynton Blair as First President of Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Peoples of this United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland hold our most blessed Monarch Elizabeth Regina in highest regard and esteem and as the Anointed of God to be Ruler in this Realm and consider her and her alone as our Head of State and so do oppose all  Usurpers in this Realm or Usurpers in European Nations who seek to undermine our Monarch`s Anointed Place. It is with deep joy and thanksgiving that we call for a National Day of Praise to Almighty God for deliverance from Despots who walk in the footsteps of their  papist forerunner Guy Fawkes.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
